step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
Nice job reaching overhead. Ensure your fingers are spread wide.
You're making a good fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Well done stretching back overhead and exhaling. Relax your muscles fully.
This step seems to be a repeat of step 4. Please ensure you are following the exercise instructions precisely.
Second rep starting well. Maintain relaxed shoulders and open fingers.
Good reach overhead. Keep those fingers spread wide.
Excellent fist and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to inhale and engage your muscles.
Great job extending overhead and exhaling. Relax completely.
This step appears to be a repeat of step 4. Please ensure you are following the exercise instructions precisely.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together during the downward push, remembering to inhale. Then, fully relax and stretch overhead while exhaling.
